house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1969 has 4 bedroom(s), 5 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 4231 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Mishan & Associate Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island, OceanAccess, Outdoor Lights
